meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6506.

td.p: Gina Armstrong, a web designer from Anniston, Alabama
Kris Hamilton, a computer technician from Dublin, Ohio
Mike Wallace, a real estate agent from Sunnyside, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $48,800)

tr.td: lifescript.com
THE OLD TESTAMENT
ON CABLE
ADD A LETTER
IT'S A GAMBLE
THE "B"-GINNING & END OF THE COUNTRY
